pt.title: Lest Coast Tattoo Studio
pt.hero_title: Tinta Old School, Estilo Lest Coast
pt.hero_text: Descubra a arte das tatuagens clássicas no Lest Coast Tattoo Studio.
pt.about_text: Conheça [Nome do Artista], a força por trás do Lest Coast Tattoo Studio. Com paixão por designs old-school e anos de experiência, trazemos arte clássica à vida com um toque único.
pt.footer: © 2025 Lest Coast Tattoo Studio. Todos os direitos reservados.
pt.form_success: Mensagem enviada! O Lest Coast Tattoo Studio entrará em contato em breve.

en.title: Lest Coast Tattoo Studio
en.hero_title: Old School Ink, Lest Coast Style
en.hero_text: Discover the art of classic tattoos at Lest Coast Tattoo Studio.
en.about_text: Meet [Artist Name], the driving force behind Lest Coast Tattoo Studio. With a passion for old-school designs and years of experience, we bring classic art to life with a unique twist.
en.footer: © 2025 Lest Coast Tattoo Studio. All rights reserved.
en.form_success: Message sent! Lest Coast Tattoo Studio will contact you soon.

nl.title: Lest Coast Tattoo Studio
nl.hero_title: Old School Ink, Lest Coast Stijl
nl.hero_text: Ontdek de kunst van klassieke tattoos bij Lest Coast Tattoo Studio.
nl.about_text: Maak kennis met [Naam Artiest], de drijvende kracht achter Lest Coast Tattoo Studio. Met een passie voor old-school designs en jarenlange ervaring brengen we klassieke kunst tot leven met een unieke twist.
nl.footer: © 2025 Lest Coast Tattoo Studio. Alle rechten voorbehouden.
nl.form_success: Bericht verstuurd! Lest Coast Tattoo Studio neemt zo snel mogelijk contact met je op.
